name: Sam
description: A GPT based slack bot trained to specific personalities and use cases.

SLACK_APP_TOKEN.description: Your Slack app's token, starting with 'xapp-'

SLACK_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Slack bot's token, starting with 'xoxb-'

OPENAI_ASSISTANT_ID.description: Your OpenAI assistant ID, starting with 'asst_'

TTS_VOICE.description: The voice to use for text-to-speech. Defaults to 'alloy'.

TTS_MODEL.description: The model to use for text-to-speech. Defaults to 'tts-1-hd'.

MAX_PROMPT_TOKENS.description: The maximum number of tokens to use in a prompt.

MAX_COMPLETION_TOKENS.description: The maximum number of tokens to use in a response.

RANDOM_RUN_RATIO.description: How often the bot randomly responds in a group channel. Defaults to 0 (never).

TIMEZONE.description: The timezone to use for scheduling. Defaults to 'UTC'.

EMAIL_URL.description: The URL to send emails to. Disabled if not set.

FROM_EMAIL.description: The email address to send emails from. Disabled if not set.

EMAIL_WHITE_LIST.description: A comma-separated list of email addresses to allow sending emails to. Disabled if not set.

BRAVE_SEARCH_API_KEY.description: Your Brave Search API key. Disabled if not set.

BRAVE_SEARCH_LONGITUDE.description: The longitude to use for Brave Search. Disabled if not set.

BRAVE_SEARCH_LATITUDE.description: The latitude to use for Brave Search. Disabled if not set.

SENTRY_DSN.description: Your Sentry DSN. Disabled if not set.

GITHUB_REPOS.description: A comma-separated list of GitHub the bot can post to. Disabled if not set.

ALGOLIA_SEARCH_API_KEY.description: Your Algolia search API key. Disabled if not set.

ALGOLIA_APPLICATION_ID.description: Your Algolia application ID. Disabled if not set.

ALGOLIA_SEARCH_INDEX.description: The Algolia search index to use. Disabled if not set.
